channel.title: Halo 3 Sandbox (solved)
channel.description:
What map pack comes with Sandbox? I know reach is comming out soon, but, I kinda want this map. But, i also dont want to waste money on the wrong pack.
EDIT - Gotten Sandtrap and Sandbox confused again, corrected =p
SOLVED - Alright, looks like its going to cost $5 for the mythic map pack (contains sandbox), idk why, but my computer wasnt loading but a select few sites for a bit there, thats why i asked =p
